Items.Title: A Local Law to provide for the establishment of a panel on regulatory review.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Provide for the establishment of a panel on regulatory review.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass Bill No. A06138, which would authorize the City of New York to privately sell certain property that cannot be independently developed.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Authorize the City of New York to privately sell certain property that cannot be independently developed.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to authorizing the commissioner of finance to establish a temporary program for the resolution of outstanding default judgments issued by the environmental control board.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Establish a temporary program for the resolution of outstanding default judgments issued by the environmental control board.

Items.Title: A Local Law to provide for the establishment of a panel on regulatory review.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Provide for the establishment of a panel on regulatory review.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass Bill No. A06138, which would authorize the City of New York to privately sell certain property that cannot be independently developed.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Authorize the City of New York to privately sell certain property that cannot be independently developed.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to authorizing the commissioner of finance to establish a temporary program for the resolution of outstanding default judgments issued by the environmental control board.
Items.ActionName: P-C Item Laid Over by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was P-C Item Laid Over by Comm
Items.MatterName: Establish a temporary program for the resolution of outstanding default judgments issued by the environmental control board.
